data: April Fool’s Day | Mablethorpe | Book-in-Hand Inn
a year last April Fool’s Day
It was a year last April Fool’s Day, I left you on the sands there at Mablethorpe, no more than a stone’s throw from the Book-in-Hand Inn, swearing that you should never see me or hear from me again.
There Is Sorrow on the Sea
